comment: A theorem used in elimination of disjoint variable restriction on ` x ` and ` y ` by replacing it with a distinctor ` -. A. x x = z ` . (Contributed by NM, 15-May-1993.) Proof is based on ~ wl-sbalnae now. See also ~ sbal1 . (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 25-Jul-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
